scripts.android: npm run build && ionic run android
scripts.android-release: npm run build && ionic build --release android && move platforms\android\build\outputs\apk\android-release-unsigned.apk WorkerManager.apk && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore mff-key.keystore WorkerManager.apk worker-manager && zipalign -v 4 WorkerManager.apk WorkerManager.apk.aligned && move WorkerManager.apk.aligned WorkerManager.apk
